body_html:
I've been using pytorch 0.1.12 on windows 10 / anaconda 4.4.0 / python 3.6 and I get this error regularly:

  File "train.py", line 660, in <module>
    main()
  File "train.py", line 316, in main
    epoch, model, loader_train, optimizer, loss_fn, args, class_weights_norm, output_dir, exp=exp)
  File "train.py", line 376, in train_epoch
    for batch_idx, (input, target, index) in enumerate(loader):
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 212, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 239, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
RuntimeError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 41, in _worker_loop
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 110, in default_collate
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 110, in <listcomp>
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 90, in default_collate
    storage = batch[0].storage()._new_shared(numel)
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\storage.py", line 111, in _new_shared
    return cls._new_using_filename(size)
RuntimeError: Couldn't open shared file mapping: <torch_14952_2721171766>, error code: <1455> at D:\Downloads\pytorch-master-1\torch\lib\TH\THAllocator.c:154

body:
I've been using pytorch 0.1.12 on windows 10 / anaconda 4.4.0 / python 3.6 and I get this error regularly:

```
  File "train.py", line 660, in <module>
    main()
  File "train.py", line 316, in main
    epoch, model, loader_train, optimizer, loss_fn, args, class_weights_norm, output_dir, exp=exp)
  File "train.py", line 376, in train_epoch
    for batch_idx, (input, target, index) in enumerate(loader):
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 212, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 239, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
RuntimeError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 41, in _worker_loop
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 110, in default_collate
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 110, in <listcomp>
    return [default_collate(samples) for samples in transposed]
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\utils\data\dataloader.py", line 90, in default_collate
    storage = batch[0].storage()._new_shared(numel)
  File "s:\toolkits\anaconda3-4.4.0\lib\site-packages\torch\storage.py", line 111, in _new_shared
    return cls._new_using_filename(size)
RuntimeError: Couldn't open shared file mapping: <torch_14952_2721171766>, error code: <1455> at D:\Downloads\pytorch-master-1\torch\lib\TH\THAllocator.c:154
```
